User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the LocalFind application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

definition.description: Stores user data. The 'userId' is the Firebase Auth UID. Each user document is independent, ensuring Authorization Independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

firestore.reasoning: Given the simple authentication requirements (password and anonymous login) and the lack of specific data entities beyond the User, the Firestore structure will focus on user management. A dedicated collection for users is the simplest and most appropriate structure. This structure ensures Authorization Independence as user data is self-contained. QAPs are satisfied as listing users would require admin privileges, not exposed to regular users.
